name: red-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Cures attraction.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A glass flute that snaps POKéMON out of attraction.
flavor_text.emerald: A glass flute that snaps POKéMON out of attraction.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A red glass flute that snaps one POKéMON out of infatuation.
